name: Marsh's Journey
description:
Created for the Epic MegaJam 2020 with blood, sweat, tears and coffee. Controls WASD - Move Space/Gamepad A - Jump Left Mouse/Gamepad X - Attack or Groundpound Story

The world is made of candy, and your people are sick. The elders spoke of a land far away that holds a secret life saving syrup. You take this journey upon yourself to find this syrup and save the village, travelling to distant lands.

Gameplay

Run, jump, bounce, smack and smash your way through colorful levels and collect as much candy as you can. Just like in real life, donuts are what protect you from damage, so make sure to collect as many as possible!

The entire game was vlogged on youtube, check it out:
